action.primary: Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang and augments Jing

indications: Kidney Yang Deficiency with impotence, and sore and weak lower back and lower extremities

action.primary: Nourishes Lung Yin, transforms Phlegm and stops bleeding

indications: Lung Yin Deficiency with chronic cough and wheezing

contraindications: Use caution for those with Exterior conditions.

useCases: Spermatorrhea, premature ejaculation, and low back and lower extremity pain from Kidney Deficiency.
As a stew for weakness, dizziness, spontaneous sweat, and other symptoms of debility and lowered resistance from weak Wei Qi.
Sweating due to weakened Wei Qi.
Cough, wheezing coughing up blood and chest pain from Lung Yin Deficiency.
Asthma with Lung and Kidney involvement.
Served daily as a beverage for Lung cancer.
As a stew for spontaneous sweating during recovery from chronic illness.
Chronic cough due to Kidney and Lung Yin Deficiencies with scanty, Blood-streaked sputum.
Chronic feeble cough and weakness due to Kidney and Ling Qi Deficiencies.

notes: It is called Winter Bug Summer Herb because it is a fungus growing on the molt of caterpillar.
It tonifies Yin and Yang so is safe to take for long periods of time.
It is expensive but can be collected locally.
It is good for focal distention and pain due to Deficiency.
It treats pangs of pain in the low back and knees.
It protects the Lungs, firms the ores and interstices.
It is also tonifies Jing and augments the marrow.
This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
It has been used recently to treat cancer, hyperlipidemia and hypertension.
This herb is often compared to Rx. Ginseng Ren Shen for its life-extending abilities.

Both Dong Chong Xia Cao and Gecko #{GeJie} Ge Jie tonify the Lungs and Kidneys, warm the Yang, augment Jing, and settle coughs and wheezing. Ge Jie is salty, neutral, calms wheezing, and stops cough by assisting the Kidneys to grasp Qi. It also strongly tonifies the Lung Qi. Dong Chong Xia Cao calms wheezing and stops cough by descending rebellious Qi. It also transforms phlegm, stops bleeding and stops sweating by reinforcing Wei Qi.
